Its a puzzle every part of the game if you have a short temper dont play this game. It does take time to get used of its hard to figure out the games purpese but you get so addicted that 1 hour feels like 1 minute. Im love futrue games and war games the gun part takes in the war game parts and the test chamber makes the futre part. Overall it is worth all the money it is worth. I had a good time with portal and I hope you will to . If you hate most games that are hard to play this is a terrible game for you. But this was Butters opion but i thoght it was fun and you should to . And then all of a sudden your now thinking with portals (if this makes you want to buy portal then buy this great game ; ) )

Really into Valve here lately and the latest game by them that I've finished, something I've noticed from valve is they like to keep things fresh and Portal is an exact example of what I mean. Like Half-Life, Portal really just throws you right into the game with really no expaination of what's going on, and at first I was like alright, I've seen gameplay, I know what to expect in the way of brain teasers and what not, but what I wasn't expecting was that there was a story shoved into this 3 to 4 hour game, and it just added to the already great experience of what is Portal.

It's innovative, beautiful, and just all around fun if you wanna give your mind a challenge and the game is just a great example of how cool the Source engine can be. It's definitely recommended if you love any of Valve's other games, it just has that same charm as Half-Life, L4D, and TF, and the splashes of humor in the game really make it even more enjoyable.

Even though it's short it's still got the replayability value to it and I'll be sure to check out the advanced stages and trying to unlock the developer commentary and get to Portal 2 soon!
A must play for any gamer.
fun

Impressionante, belo e divertido são adjetivos comuns para bons jogos. No caso de "Portal", só isso não é suficiente. "Genial" seria a palavra certa para qualificá-lo. É um título que deixará qualquer um boquiaberto, tamanha a complexidade de sua mecânica e quebra-cabeças. O nível de desafio é alto, mas basta botar a cabeça para funcionar para que se chegue a uma solução - o que é altamente gratificante. A atmosfera claustrofóbica e perturbadora, por mais sutil que seja, fará você se sentir ameaçado, sendo que nem inimigos há no jogo. Pode ser curto, mas é um dos mais imersivos e intrigantes jogos já lançados, cuja experiência proporcionada será lembrada por muito tempo.
V社的一大良心啊 十分推荐！

Интересная и увлекательная игра
(Interesting and exciting game)

Ahh, the first portal, such a good game in many ways, the puzzle concept of having to get to the end of a level using portals and the physics that come with them. IMO worth the purchase even if you have Portal 2 just for the story line and orginality. If you have never played the series, play it!

This game is a masterpeice.

I first played this game back in 2007, where I beat it in a day. I've beaten this game countless times, it really is one of my favorite games, I probably like it just as much as Portal 2, the game that a lot of people I know like better than the original.

Where do I start. This game is still as good as it was 7 years ago (Wow! It's been that long). The Graphics are a 10/10 they still look amazing today. For the few songs that play in the game, they fit in perfectly and help you immerse yourself, 10/10. When I first saw this game I was skeptical if I would be fast enough to place Portals, don't worry though, this game is easy to get into and there is basically no learning curve, although ths doesn't mean it is an easy game, I remember a few chambers taking me about an hour the first time I played it, although they were still enjoyable while trying to find out what to do. Gameplay gets a 10/10. The story, what story. The presentation is good, everything feels connected. The envirnments aren't anything too fancy to look at, with some bland textures, but I'm pretty sure this was done on purpose to ad to the feel that you are in a testing lab, it isn't supposed to look fancy. Presentation gets a 8/10.

Usually this would average in for a clean 9.5, but this game is so fabtastic, I think I'll just give it a 10/10.

Great game, I higly recommend any person that has a Steam account to buy this.

An amazing game with good graphics for a game made over 3 years ago. Very original story and creation (the portal gun). The final battle (no spoilers) is THE most amazing, creative and gripping boss battle I have ever had the pleasure to play. I really want to Portal 2, but I'll wait until the price drops. Really fun and puzzling (I admit I had to look up a few levels)! I recommend this to every kind of audience! :D

Portal is still one of the smartest games I have ever played. It has a relatively short campaign (I blew through it in around 3 hours) but your value and brainpower (aneurysm?) is extended through the advanced chambers and challenges. It is hilarious, challenging and smart; three factors most triple A games don't achieve (and considering Valve made portal as a low budget filler game that is saying something). My only point deduction came from my achievements not popping as they should which drove me mental (not getting the achievement for The six advanced maps was soul crushing).

Buy this game. 9/10

Short, sharp, incredibly witty and endlessly quotable. Is it just a series of puzzles, or is it an escape from automated hell at the hands of a psychopathic AI? Amazingly, it manages to excel at both, as well as its script, its music, its art style and everything else about it, which is quite an achievement given it's the first game to feature portals as a playable mechanic. Talk about knocking it out of the park on the first try.

Portalを開始ししてすぐに、私達はこのゲームが並みのパズルゲームとは一線を画しているということに気が付くことができる。FPSということが理由ではない。無機質で近未来的な空間や謎に満ちた天の声、主人公自らの姿を見ることができる不思議な空間の出現――。最初は一体何が始まってしまったのだろう…という戸惑いを与えられるが、出現した空間＝ポータルを通って部屋の外へ出た時、何とも言えない感動に襲われる。「これがPortalの世界か！」と。

ただ、ゲームプレイが始まっても明確な目的は提示されず、天の声に導かれるままにテストと称される独特なパズル部屋を1つずつクリアしていく形式で物語は進んでいく。しかし、決して退屈することはない。紹介ムービーにあるように、Aperture Science社が産み出した画期的なポータル生成装置を用いてポータルを発生させることにより、一瞬で遠くの場所へ移動したり、物理法則を利用して宙を舞ったり、迎え撃つ敵を倒すという快感を味わうことが可能である。そして、ステージを経る毎にそれは増していくのだ。

また、天の声の主はウィットに富んでいて、時に厳しく、時に優しく、プレーヤーを次のテストへと導いてくれる。おまけに、完遂した暁にはケーキを食べさせてくれるというのだから、甘いもの好きにはたまらない！少々冷た過ぎるきらいがあるが、何のことはない。プレイしている内に彼女が段々と愛らしくなってくるし、一体次にどんなことを言ってくれるのだろうという好奇心が生まれ、パズルを解こうという意欲も湧いてくるというものである。

そして、スムーズに行けば、このゲームをクリアーするのにそれ程長くの時間を要することはない。しかし、この世界観を堪能しようとすればする程に、それはどんどん増えることとなる。ごく一部には、あるテストの最中に世界観に入り込み過ぎて、クリアーすることを放棄してしまったプレーヤーも居ると聞いている（ただの風の便りだが）。

最後にアドバイスとして、こまめにクイックセーブを行うことをオススメする。何故なら、このゲームでは簡単に死ぬことができるからだ。当然、テストに死はつきものである。しかし、我々にはクイックセーブという文明の利器が与えられているのだから、これを利用しない手はない。また、このゲームにおいて死は悲観的なものではない。すぐにやり直しができるし、時には死ぬことによって問題の解決法を見つけることだってできる。恐れるより、まずは失敗して死んでみよう。そして、最後にはケーキを得るのだ！


P.S. 既に発売されてからかなりの時が経っているので躊躇なく書くが、物語は続編のPortal2へと続いている。こちらは更に濃厚なテストや物語が用意されているので、ぜひPortalと合わせて購入して頂きたい。

Almost as bad as it's fanboys.

The game itself is fine as its initial iteration. A tech demo stocking stuffer only, but as a full price game? No, not really. That means it is short, and unrefined. It fails to last long enough to even contemplate having complicated, or challenging puzzles. 

Even the time the game does stick with you, it fails to impress on many levels. Many of the puzzle mechanics, or solutions are simple, or just plain annoying. For example, the energy ball. Does anybody really like that timed-only-a-few-bounces ball, that never seems to connect with the target, nor do it within a respectable amount of time. Is it unique? Ya sure, the game is fairly unique, but a bent fork is unique too, does not make it any good. 

Is there good things about the game? Yes. The music is rather good, as everyone can probably agree. As well, the game can run on any dinosaur system you can imagine, probably DOS systems as well. The game does not overstay its welcome as well. It at least has the brevity to end quickly so you do not have listen to the inane jokes, or fiddle with its rather annoying puzzle mechanics.

And lastly, the pandering of this game as the reincarnation of Jesus Christ, and the reiteration of the phrase "the cake is a lie" has made the games community, and fans insufferable. This only makes playing the game even more painful, because you know that saying anything bad will come with backlash.
Awesomez
